finding.title: A Methodology to Engineer and Validate Dynamic Multi-level Multi-agent Based Simulations
finding.description: This article proposes a methodology to model and simulate complex systems, based on IRM4MLS, a generic agent-based meta-model able to deal with multi-level systems. This methodology permits the engineering of dynamic multi-level agent-based models, to represent complex systems over several scales and domains of interest. Its goal is to simulate a phenomenon using dynamically the lightest representation to save computer resources without loss of information. This methodology is based on two mecha
finding.implementationSuggestion: Evaluate agent architecture improvements for LAPA-VOID agent system
